INTERSHOP IOM 5.2.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision 6edb3d8be162fde081a9e6e668ef11ddc3664951)

Table oms.OrganizationDO

Organizations build a single tree structure on shops and suppliers, with following restricting rules:
- All shops and suppliers have exactly one correponding organization
- A supplier can only have another supplier as child
- A shop can only have another shop as child
- Organizations can exist for their own (neither a shop nor a supplier)
Sub-trees defined in SupplierDO or ShopDO also exist in the Organization tree (managed by triggers)
A user that have a given role in a given organization have the same corresponding permissions in all children.

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id integer PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL nextval('"OrganizationDO_id_seq"')  
OrganizationTypeDefDO OrganizationTypeDefRef integer NOT_NULL 1  
OrganizationDO parentId integer  
ShopDO shopId bigint UNIQUE  
SupplierDO supplierId bigint UNIQUE  
name varchar NOT_NULL  
description varchar  
version bigint NOT_NULL 1  

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.

Triggers 

Name Comment Definition
push_organization_changes_tr
  • Ensure that the global organization structure remains consistent with the shop and supplier sub trees.
  • Raise exceptions on invalid operations (some changes must be performed in the ShopDO or SupplierDO rather than here.
  • Remove User2Role2Organization assignments that become invalid on tree changes
 CREATE TRIGGER push_organization_changes_tr AFTER INSERT OR DELETE OR UPDATE ON "OrganizationDO" FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION push_organization_changes_trf() 
verify_organization2shop_tr CREATE CONSTRAINT TRIGGER verify_organization2shop_tr AFTER INSERT OR DELETE OR UPDATE ON "OrganizationDO" DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION verify_shop2organization_trf() 
verify_organization2supplier_tr CREATE CONSTRAINT TRIGGER verify_organization2supplier_tr AFTER INSERT OR DELETE OR UPDATE ON "OrganizationDO" DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION verify_supplier2organization_trf() 
z_prevent_organization_cycles_tr CREATE CONSTRAINT TRIGGER z_prevent_organization_cycles_tr AFTER INSERT OR UPDATE ON "OrganizationDO" DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION prevent_organization_cycles_trf() 

Constraints and Indexes 

Type Name Definition
PRIMARY KEY OrganizationDO_pk PRIMARY KEY (id) 
CHECK CONSTRAINT OrganizationDO_ck1 CHECK (NOT ("shopId" IS NOT NULL AND "supplierId" IS NOT NULL)) 
UNIQUE CONSTRAINT OrganizationDO_uko UNIQUE ("shopId") 
UNIQUE CONSTRAINT OrganizationDO_uku UNIQUE ("supplierId") 
FOREIGN KEY OrganizationDO_fk_Org FOREIGN KEY ("parentId") REFERENCES "OrganizationDO"(id) DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED 
FOREIGN KEY OrganizationDO_fk_OrgType FOREIGN KEY ("OrganizationTypeDefRef") REFERENCES "OrganizationTypeDefDO"(id) 
FOREIGN KEY OrganizationDO_fk_Shop FOREIGN KEY ("shopId") REFERENCES "ShopDO"(id) DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED 
FOREIGN KEY OrganizationDO_fk_sup FOREIGN KEY ("supplierId") REFERENCES "SupplierDO"(id) DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED 
INDEX Organization_shop CREATE INDEX "Organization_shop" ON "OrganizationDO" USING btree ("shopId") WHERE "OrganizationTypeDefRef" = 2 
INDEX Organization_sup CREATE INDEX "Organization_sup" ON "OrganizationDO" USING btree ("supplierId") WHERE "OrganizationTypeDefRef" = 3
